column5: Description:  Stunning 3000 sq ft 4 bedrooms, 4 ½ bath, modern vacation rental with pool, spa, back yard kitchen cabana with fireplace and living area plus a basketball court! Sleeps 11 easily with a total of 17 if you use the sofas. 12 minutes to down town Abilene. For all our rodeo and cutting horse friends we have adjoining land to park your trailer or RV’s. For those of you attending a retreat or a wedding at our L’il California Event Center we have accommodations just a short walk away.
